thread.title: Division One League Board expunges Wa African United's points from 2014/15 season
thread.title_full: Division One League Board expunges Wa African United's points from 2014/15 season

title: Division One League Board expunges Wa African United's points from 2014/15 season
text:
10:40 CET Division One League Board expunges Wa African United's points from 2014/15 season - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
In accordance with Article 14(5) of the GFA General Regulations, the Division One League Board has expunged the points of Wa African United from the 2014/15 GN Bank Division One League. 
Article 14(5): 'The GFA shall expunge from the competition any points and/or goals build-up in respect of matches played with a club that withdraws from the competition after the competition has started'. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
